divs: Sighting DetailsI was just leaving walmart and i was in the parking lot. i was looking at the stars. A plane. it was moving very slow and was not blinking like a plane. i felt exsided because i never seen a ufo before. it dissapeared.
Summary: It was a red triangular shape moving in the sky. We chased it and it was gone.
